version_description:
2.0.2:
- Fixed ability to restore premium content purchases in prior versions.

2.0.1:
- Bug fixes

2.0.0:
- Content updates for 2016 (new CPT codes and updated RVUs)
CPT Assistant content for August and September.

• Code number listings now include icons that indicate new codes, revised codes, telemedicine codes, modifier 51 exempt, and FDA approval pending
• Added capability to tap on an icon to see its meaning
• Free version enhanced to include keyword searching of E/M codes
• In premium versions:
- New links from the full CPT code displays to the applicable AMA Coding Guidelines
- Ability to toggle between local and national reimbursement settings (GPCI codes)
- RVU display enhanced to show Technical Component and Professional Component (modifier 26) values when applicable
- Proprietary Laboratory Analysis codes added (within Pathology and Laboratory Services codes)

• Code number listings now include icons that indicate new codes, revised codes, telemedicine codes, modifier 51 exempt, and FDA approval pending
• Added capability to tap on an icon to see its meaning
• Free version enhanced to include keyword searching of E/M codes
• In premium versions:
- New links from the full CPT code displays to the applicable AMA Coding Guidelines
- Ability to toggle between local and national reimbursement settings (GPCI codes)
- RVU display enhanced to show Technical Component and Professional Component (modifier 26) values when applicable
- Proprietary Laboratory Analysis codes added (within Pathology and Laboratory Services codes)

• Premium products 
- A new Coding and Billing Pack that provides access to the 2017 and 2018 code sets as well as full-color procedural illustrations
 - A new CPT Assistant Archive that provides access to all articles written in 1990 through 2017

 - A new CPT Assistant Archive that provides access to all articles written in 1990 through 2017
- Bug Fixes
